name: animus shade sorcerer

specials.name: Reach Spell
specials.description: Trigger You start to cast a spell that has a range. The spell must have a maximum of two spellcasting actions.  Effect: You can extend the range of your spells. If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell that has a range, increase that spellâ€™s range by 30 feet. As is standard for increasing spell ranges, if the spell normally has a range of touch, you extend its range to 30 feet.

specials.name: Mental Static
specials.description:
An animus shade creates a field around itself that impedes the mental abilities of all creatures within 30ft.  Those creates must make a Will Save DC 19 while within the aura.
Success No effect
Failure Stupified 1 for 1 minute
Critical Failure Stupified 2 for 1 minute

specials.name: Mental Schism
specials.description: An animus shade is immune to all effects that are dependent on alignment.

specials.name: Sorceress of Ice
specials.description: The animus shades spells with the cold trait do an additional 4 damage and gain the critical effect: slowed 1.
